info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Berkshire County through 830 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Great Barrington, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Lee, Monterey, Tyringham, Brookside, East Lee, Leisure Lee, West Becket, Hartsville, North Otis, Hephzibah Heights and West Otis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
